chapters.title: Prelude
chapters.info: Lieutenant-General Tylee Khirgan, p. 30—Lieutenant-General in the Seanchan army and controller of several raken. She has a heavily scarred face, short black hair in tight curls against her scalp, and dark skin. Her hair is sprinkled with white at her temples. She is from Maram Kashor, a dry island off the southeast tip of Seanchan. Her ancestors traveled with Luthair. She made a pact with Perrin Aybara to fight the Shaido in exchange for any Wise Ones they could capture and make into damane. For her service to the Empire, she was made Lieutenant-General and Raised to the Low Blood. She is “fond” of Perrin, and respects him greatly.
